scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.build:backend: yarn prisma:generate && yarn workspace backend build
scripts.build:all: yarn prisma:migrate && yarn build:backend && yarn build:frontend
scripts.start:all: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" -c "bgGreen,bgMagenta" "yarn workspace backend start" "yarn workspace frontend start"
scripts.build-and-run: yarn && docker compose up -d && sleep 5 && yarn build:all && yarn start:all
